resources.string: Confirm your screen lock PIN,Pattern or Password
Please set the screen lock Manually by navigating to : Settings>Security.
Notepad is not secure or user cancelled the request.
This Note has been marked important, authentication will be required.
You can access this note without any authentication.

"***About the Application.***

"
"1. A light weight application to take notes, So that you can concentrate on bigger things in life.
" "2. Your data is backed up securely (So much that even we can’t access it) to restore during application reinstalls.
" "3. To avoid those overly curious people whom you give your phone to, there is authentication requirement for marked notes.
" "4. Hassel free operation as your data is saved instantaneous (every moment literally not even kidding).
" "5. This application support across devices of various screen sizes. Whatever it is Phones, tablets, 16:9, 18:9 phablets we got you covered. 
" "6. Share the saved notes via any application which supports text or save the notes as a text file.
" "7. Browse to open a text file (.txt) and save them to notes or to save as a different text file.

"
"***Things you could expect from this application:*** 

"
"1. Support across devices. 
" "2. Secure - no way to read the date unless saved to text file. 
" "3. Stared Notes requires authentication for any modifications.
" "4. Fool proof feature to prevent deleting of Stared Notes.
" "5. Light weight application – not a resource hungry app. 
" "6. Save to a .txt file. 
" "7. Open any .txt files. 
" "8. Share the content across device via text. 
 
"
"***Things we expect from this application.*** 
 
"
"1. Your kind and valuable feedback to help us grow. 
" "2. A little love in share our application with others. 
 
"
"***About us.*** 
"
"The contents of this were developed from the scratch, and all the contents are ©Copyright protected. Any infringement will be subject to copyright law. 
"
